March 20, 2025 - Just Born, Inc., is an American family-owned confectionery company based in Bethlehem, Pennsylvania. It manufactures and markets a number of confectionery, including Goldenberg's Peanut Chews, Hot Tamales, Mike and Ike, Peeps, Teenee Beanee jelly beans, and Zours.

Just Born produces some of your most beloved treats, including Marshmallow Peeps, Peanut Chews, Hot Tamales, and, my favorite candy of all time ever, Mike & Ike's! This amazing company started all the way back in 1923 when entrepreneur Sam Born opened his very own candy shop in Brooklyn, New York.
